name: Kobold Fishing
description:
Assist the kobolds as they search the ocean for fish with the help of a magic orb that uses gold. As you catch fish, they become more valuable but catch too many of the same kind and they will go extinct. You will have to manage the fish and your gold so that you can keep fishing. If the orb runs out of power, or you run out of fish it's the end of the fishing trip.

Use the mouse to direct the boat.

Stop to catch fish.

Have fun.

*No kobolds were harmed to make this game.
